Aogami Type-C: Chiyoda 2 Aogami Husk (CoC) or Yoyogi Aogami Husk (CoV)

Tsukuyomi Ultimus: Tokyo Diet Building Head Researcher after reaching Empyrean: Path to the Throne (CoV)
